This oil-free daily face wash is designed to help remove dirt, oil, and bacteria from skin for calm, clear, stress-free skin
Formulated with aloe vera, the cleanser is suitable to cleanse sensitive skin and has a gentle aloe vera scent

body.description: Gently cleanse your sensitive skin with Clean & Clear Aloe Vera Gentle Facial Cleanser. Designed for stressed-out, acne-prone skin, this aloe vera foaming cleanser softens and freshens skin as it removes dirt, oil, and bacteria that can clog pores. The oil-free, vegan face wash is formulated with aloe vera, has a fresh aloe scent, and is not tested on animals. The gentle formula is also paraben-free, sulfate-free, phthalate-free, oil-free, soap-free and dye-free. It leaves skin feeling clean, clear, and calm. Use this gentle aloe vera cleanser with the Clean & Clear Aloe Calming Gel Moisturizer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clean & Clear Aloe Vera Gentle Acne Facial Cleanser, 7.5 fl. Oz Meet our gentlest cleanser ever! Formulated with aloe vera extract, this gentle foaming face wash softens and freshens skin as it removes dirt, oil, and bacteria that can clog pores. Made for sensitive, stressed-out, and acne-prone skin, it won’t leave your skin feeling stripped or overdry your skin. Formulated without parabens, phthalates, sulfates, oils, soaps, and dyes. Vegan and never tested on animals. Hypoallergenic with a gentle, hypoallergenic aloe vera fragrance. Non-comedogenic so won’t clog pores. Packaging made with 30% post-consumer recycled plastic.

Aloe Vera Extract Gentle, oil-free products keep your skin calm, clear and stress free Vegan 100% plant-based ingredients Animal Friendly Product not tested on animals Better for the Planet Made with up to 30% post-consumer recycled plastics

CLEANSE Start your regimen with Clean & Clear Aloe Vera Gentle Acne Facial Cleanser to help remove the dirt & oil that builds over time. TREAT After you cleanse your skin, target your breakouts with acne spot treatments. MOISTURIZE Apply your favorite moisturizer to hydrate your skin. SPF If you're prepping for the day, don't forget to apply sunscreen! We recommend using a minimum of SPF 30 to protect your skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasant surprise. Perfect gel moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: The calming gel was awesome for my skin. It stung a bit but because i used it on broken irritated skin. Once that area healed over it was fine. It is a very neutral product. By that I mean it does what it says. It is a very light gel that sunk in quickly and did calm the skin on my acne prone face and neck. Face is dewy but not sticky and definitely not greasy. The scent is amazing. I noticed that it does seem to promote healing as well. Overnight I noticed dry cracks and lesions from acne meds close up and skin pull together.This moisturizer works for me and is exactly what I wanted-moisture without irritating ingredients. Bonus! It feels cool and refreshing too. Perfect for overnight as it doesn’t end up all over the pillowcase or in my hair. I would by again and recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Great price.
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash. It's clean and gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin. But beware, my order was packaged well and there was still over half of it in the bag that was supposed to be protecting it. You win some and you lose some.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleanser ticks off the right boxes: mild, moisturizing, little scent
reviews.reviewText: First try, this cleanser would not cure my rosacea. But after a prescription treatment, I knew it to be mild and moisturizing and, so far, this facial cleanser seems to be a good choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on my skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After an other famous brand skin cleaner which went to the trash this one is to go with. This doesn't dry out skin, doesn't make rashes. It does moisturizes and cleans and also the skin feels good after.I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels just like pure aloe Vera but better!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this brand and product! I have dry sensitive skin and this is the one product that I know if I put it on it will leave me with that dream glow. I also use this with their Aloe Vera face wash! That also leaves your skin feeling soooo refreshed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for mature skin
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to get behind this. I’m 34 and have used clean and clear acne moisturizer forever in the white and purple bottle- I’m talking like at least 15 years. It has been great for my skin. But now, my skin is maturing and I’m needing more moisture with the benefits of fighting a few pimples. This aloe moisturizer smells like cucumber, strongly. It also dries instantly on the skin leaving a tightness and not a moisturizing feeling. I also broke out in tiny little random white heads. I have pretty great skin, and this is the only change I’ve made. I don’t recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice on sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This cleanser is amazing for sensitive skin. No harsh chemicals or fragrances. Leaves a hydrating and refreshing affect after wash.
El producto llegó con una fuga alrededor de la tapa y no trae sello de garantía. Por este motivo no lo volvería a comprar.
